name: Slime Tales
description:
Everyone is after you!

A poor slime can't do much by itself, but you have a secret trick up your... Blob?

Jump over an unsuspecting creep, recovering some life, and assimilating his abilities!

Be careful, though. Slimes are unstable, and as such, you'll lose your new form over time, reverting to your old boring self...

Controls

(Better played with controller)

  • Analog stick / Arrows - Movement
  • X Button / LShift - Jump (absorb)
  • A Button / LCtril - Attack (once absorbed) / Accept
  • B Button / Esc - Back / Exit

GO SLIME THEM!
